LanguageData.AIU_HoursUntilUncomfortable_desc: The number of hours it takes for a pawn with 1 discomfort to get a mood penalty. Having higher discomfort will speed this up considerably.
LanguageData.AIU_DiscomfortRecoveryMultiplier_desc: How fast a pawn recovers from being uncomfortable. At 1, it takes 1 hour to recover from 1 hours of wearing uncomfortable clothes at discomfort 1. At 2, it takes 30 minutes from to recover from 1 hour of uncomfortable clothes, at 0.5 it takes 2 hours, etc.
LanguageData.AIU_GlobalDiscomfortMultiplier_desc: A pawn's total discomfort will be multiplied by this amount. Set this low if you feel pawns get uncomfortable too easy, or higher for the opposite effect.
LanguageData.AIU_DisableThought_desc: Turns off the uncomfortable apparel thought and pauses the apparel comfort need, but doesn't actually completely disable every system. Use this if you are running into issues.
